title: Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping         Dayton & Greene County Convention & Visitors Bureau  While the park does not have any concessions or vending machines or overnight facilities, there are plenty of local eateries and overnight accommodations that visitors can choose from.  Thanks to the Dayton & Greene County Convention & Visitors Bureaus, there is now a list of Lodging and Restaurants around the park in Dayton to assist those in planning their visit to the area.  Many thanks to both bureaus for providing this information. Visitors to the park in the downtown Dayton area should view choices listed from the Dayton CVB.  Those visiting the park in the Wright-Patterson AFB area should view choices listed from the Greene County CVB. Area Campgrounds  Even though Dayton Aviation Heritage NHP has no campgrounds or recreational facilities, there are local Campgrounds near the park which may suit your needs.  You can also visit recreation.gov for a list of federal recreational sites which offer camping and recreational facilities.
